Signed-off-by: Abdelhamid Bakhta <abdelhamid.bakhta@consensys.net>

Add support for CORS origin requests for in browser http calls.
- Added `--rest-api-cors-origins` CLI option to `BeaconRestApiOptions`
- Updated `GlobalConfiguration` and `GlobalConfigurationBuilder` accordingly
- Added unit tests to `BeaconRestApiOptionsTest` to cover the new option
- Updated existing unit test in `BeaconRestApiOptionsTest` that reads from a configuration file to add the new option and a missing option (`--rest-api-host-allowlist`
